title: SHOW/DESC SERVICE commands and SERVICES view (ACCOUNT_USAGE and INFORMATION SCHEMA): New column MIN_READY_INSTANCES (Pending) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_08 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the SHOW SERVICES and DESCRIBE SERVICE commands, SERVICES view (ACCOUNT_USAGE), and SERVICES view (INFORMATION_SCHEMA) include the following new column:
Indicates the minimum service instances that must be ready for Snowflake to consider the service is ready to process requests. The default is the same value as the MIN_INSTANCES.
